meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a hippy.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit was quite hippyish with the colorful headband and flowing skirt.
meanings.sent2: The room had a hippyish vibe with tie-dye tapestries and incense burning.
meanings.sent3: He tried to make his office look more hippyish by adding a lava lamp.
meanings.sent4: The garden had a hippyish feel, with wildflowers growing freely.
meanings.sent5: The music festival was a hippyish paradise, filled with peace signs and flower crowns.

meanings.definition: Tending to follow the beliefs or practices associated with hippies.
meanings.sent1: Their communal living arrangement was quite hippyish, with shared meals and group meditation.
meanings.sent2: She had a hippyish approach to environmental issues, always advocating for sustainable practices.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a hippyish protest involved tie-dye banners and acoustic guitar music.
meanings.sent4: The restaurant had a hippyish menu, focusing on organic, locally sourced ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The classroom had a hippyish atmosphere, encouraging open-minded discussions and creativity.
